channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: "Nuclear option" lingers over Senate as members leave for August recess
item.description: Senate leaders failed to reach a bipartisan deal to speed through more of President Trump's nominees — so senators are heading home with a GOP promise...

item.title: Senate confirms Jeanine Pirro as top federal prosecutor for D.C.

item.title: Former Trump prosecutor Jack Smith faces investigation by Office of Special Counsel
item.description: Jack Smith, who pursued two cases against Donald Trump, is being investigated for potentially violating the Hatch Act.

item.title: States sue Trump admin over trans care access
item.description: Sixteen states and the District of Columbia are suing the Trump administration over what they charge is a coordinated federal effort to intimidate hea...

item.description: White House envoy Steve Witkoff told hostage families on Saturday that President Trump wants to "shift" the Gaza policy from trying to get a partial a...

item.title: Voting Rights Act's 60th anniversary comes amid uncertainty and Trump redistricting moves
item.description: Barriers that the Voting Rights Act of 1965 aimed to eliminate have reappeared in modern forms as the country marks its 60th anniversary. The big pict...

item.title: Senate GOP eyes recess appointments as stalemate drags on

item.title: Supreme Court signals it may rule on law protecting power of minority voters
item.description: The justices asked opposing parties in a battle over a Louisiana voting map to submit briefs addressing the matter.

item.title: Republican war hawks find momentum, a trust-but-verify moment with Trump

item.title: Trump fires statistics chief after soft jobs report
item.description: The monthly jobs report showed just 73,000 jobs in July, with big reductions to May's and June's numbers

item.title: Trump is under water on some of his top issues — including immigration, poll shows
item.description: The president’s approval rating had been ticking upward since its biggest drop in April.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
